changeSet.author: hparry
changeSet.createView:
SELECT auth.id, auth.name, classifier.name as classifier, classification.name as classification, bridge.name as relationship, authorized_rel.name as child_classifier, authorized_parent.name as child_classification, classification.domain as classification_domain, authorized_parent.domain as child_classification_domain, jsonb_pretty(auth.schema) as schema, jsonb_pretty(auth.default_properties) as default_properties, res.name as authority, w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc
from existential_network_authorization auth join facet parent on auth.parent = parent.id join facet child on auth.child = child.id join existential classification on parent.classification = classification.id join existential classifier on parent.classifier = classifier.id left join existential bridge on auth.relationship = bridge.id left join existential authorized_parent on child.classification = authorized_parent.id left join existential authorized_rel on child.classifier = authorized_rel.id left join existential res on auth.authority = res.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON auth.workspace = w.id LEFT JOIN workspace_label wa ON wa.workspace = w.id AND wa.reference = auth.id
